original_title: 秘密捜査官の女 裏切りの連鎖
overview: Amatsuka appears as a failed undercover investigation. The role of death row prisoner! Her parents and younger brother were killed by drug addicts, serially murdered for revenge, arrested and sentenced to death. However, a man from the Special Public Security Bureau, dressed as Tony Oki, visited a cell and said, "I will exempt the death penalty if you cooperate with the eradication of drug groups." "Your murderer's trick is to let the other person take care of you by color schemes and poisoning. But I guess you were feeling it too." "That's not true." To bear. And infiltrate. Although she was slim and cool in the shooting battle, she was caught and raped by the boss of the organization that plays the role of Takuhama Yoshimura. I was crying at the last pity. "Ah" sounds like "meow" Amatsuka 's writhing voice is still cute, her thin belly and thin arms are really sensual, and Wai loves Angel Moe!
tagline: Moe Amatsuka dressed as a murderer!
title: The Undercover Female Investigator. The Chain Of Betrayal. Moe Amatsuka
